needFeedback:
**Functional Purpose**: Tab title for representations that require feedback.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Automation page, above the list of representations.
**When Users See This**: Always visible on the Automation page.
**Technical Context**: Displays the count of representations needing feedback.
**Current English**: "Need feedback"
feedbackSubmitted:
**Functional Purpose**: Tab title for representations where feedback has been submitted.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Automation page, above the list of representations.
**When Users See This**: Always visible on the Automation page.
**Technical Context**: Displays the count of representations with submitted feedback.
**Current English**: "Feedback submitted"
admin:
**Functional Purpose**: Tab title for admin-related representations.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Automation page, above the list of representations.
**When Users See This**: Always visible on the Automation page.
**Technical Context**: Displays the count of representations in the admin category.
**Current English**: "Admin"
onlyShowSolutions:
**Functional Purpose**: Checkbox label to filter representations to only those mentored by the current user.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Automation page, to the right of the tabs, when 'Need feedback' or 'Admin' tabs are selected.
**When Users See This**: When viewing representations in the 'Need feedback' or 'Admin' tabs.
**Technical Context**: Clicking this toggles a filter. 'checked' and 'setChecked' props must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Only show solutions I've mentored before"
filterByExercise:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for the search input field.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Automation page, within the search bar, next to the track filter.
**When Users See This**: When the search input field is empty.
**Technical Context**: Guides user input for filtering by exercise name. 'filter' and 'setFilter' props must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Filter by exercise (min 3 chars)"
